room_title: Escape room "Scarlett's Room" by The Captured in Pigeon Forge
review: Although we ended up as Scarlett's newest broken toys, we still had an absolute blast here and can't wait to come back to work our way through both chapters (and the third when it opens). This is one of the best attractions in Gatlinburg - if you haven't tried it yet, do it NOW! It's an adrenaline rush like no other!

room_title: Escape room "Scarlett's Room" by The Captured in Pigeon Forge
review: This was the first escape room we had ever done and we’ve done many since then. None of them come close to this one. We did Scarlett’s room and it was amazing from the second we walked in! I don’t know if we’ll find another that will beat this one!

room_title: Escape room "Scarlett's Room" by The Captured in Pigeon Forge
review: Awesome experience! Fun, interactive, and definitely a must do activity in Gatlinburg!

room_title: Escape room "Scarlett's Room" by The Captured in Pigeon Forge
review: Accompanied by a great team, a great staff and great set up of props and special effects, this was by far the best experience my wife and I have experienced! Thank you to the Craft family for a wonderful time, unfortunately for you though, you couldn't enjoy us for dinner.

room_title: Escape room "Scarlett's Room" by The Captured in Pigeon Forge
review: Very fun and exciting, and would love to do it again. The awesome staff made it even more fun, and location is with waking distance of everything. Totally worth the time and money!
